title: The Over-the-Top Mother’s Day Gift Guide
sub_head: 10 utterly ‘extra’ gifts for Mom, because after two years of restraint, she deserves some extravagance—like a blinding neon-print dress and the biggest bag you’ve ever seen
body:
FOR THE LAST two years, a lot of moms have been at home, in their least glamorous clothes, focusing on their children. Now they can finally (if cautiously) go outside and see friends that circumstances may have led them to neglect since early 2020. For these outings, Mom might want to make the statement “I’m back, baby!” so why not lavish her with unnecessarily extravagant gifts that will facilitate a little well-earned extraness.
From a stupendously broad sun hat to an obscenely ornate lipstick case, these 10 showy Mother’s Day presents will make her forget all about you. And it’s about time.
